No part of it, in any form or by any means (electronic, mechanical, copying, recording, or otherwise) may be used for purposes other than that intended by the Copyright owner and subject to the conditions prescribed under the applicable copyright legislation.
translation.copyrightJurisdiction: Any juristic person found in possession of content from this website, or employing methods and applications described herein, which does not have the express permission to do so, may be prosecuted. If you have inadvertently accessed or obtained this website’s restricted content, please contact {{ownershipFullName}} using the contact details below or send the material back at the address listed below.
translation.name: Name
translation.loginNeeded: You must be logged in to access this section.
translation.sessionExpireWarningMessage: Your session will expire soon due to inactivity, would you like to stay logged in?
translation.escapeSearch: When search input is selected: Resets the search input
translation.confirmDialogDescription: Do you want to save the Information?
translation.confirmLeaveEditDialogMessage: There are unsaved changes detected on the edit page, would you like to discard the changes and leave the page?
translation.confirmLeaveAddDialogMessage: There are unsaved changes detected on the add page, would you like to discard the changes and leave the page?
translation.unknownError: Unknown Error! Please reload and try again.
translation.confirmDialog: When dialog is open: Confirm and proceed with action
translation.cancelDialog: When dialog is open: Cancel action and close dialog
translation.discardChangesList: Discard all changes and return to the list
translation.errorRejected: The request to the system was rejected.
translation.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Trafman Transgressions system!
translation.homePageDescription: Here you can process transgressions related to overloaded vehicles that enter the weigh station.
translation.saveChangesList: When entered values are valid and save button is enabled: Save Changes
translation.menuTerminalInstallTitle: Please install the Trafman App in order to function as a specialised terminal.
translation.menuTerminalFileTitle: Please select the Trafman launch file.
translation.menuTerminalFileNotPWA: Open the installed Trafman App (not a browser) in order to configure the terminal.
translation.menuTerminalFileInvalidMac: The provided Trafman launch file is not valid for this device.
translation.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
translation.loginError: An error occurred during login. Please try again.
translation.newPasswordSameAsOld: New password cannot be the same as the current password
